section2.title: § 2. Definitions
items: Service – electronic services provided by the Provider under the Flovers brand, including the mobile application, website, and backend infrastructure
Application – the Flovers mobile application available for Android devices (and iOS in the future)
Website – the Flovers website together with documentation and informational content
User – a person using the Service; in the case of registration, a person who has created an Account
Account – an individual user account within the Provider’s system, protected by a password
Device – a device used by the User to access the Service (e.g. phone, tablet) and, where applicable, a measurement device (e.g. Arduino) sending sensor data
Plant Definition – a plant profile created by the Provider containing general characteristics, preferences, and care recommendations, which may include automatically generated content
Plant Instance – a plant created by the User within their Account, representing their own specimen, optionally linked to a Plant Definition
Sensor Data – data from sensors such as air temperature, air humidity, soil moisture, or light level, assigned to a Plant Instance
Reminder – a definition of a recurring plant-care activity (e.g. watering, misting, fertilising, repotting) used to generate Tasks
Task – a specific action generated from a Reminder, which may be marked as completed and annotated by the User
User Content – all data and content created, uploaded, or maintained by the User within the Service
Plant Recognition – a feature that analyses a photo provided by the User and returns a recognition result generated by the Provider’s system

section3.title: § 3. Scope of the Service and functionalities
section3.intro: The Service may include, in particular:
list: registration and management of an Account (login, e-mail confirmation, password reset, re-sending activation links)
access to a library of Plant Definitions with care guidance
creation of Plant Instances and maintenance of plant diaries and history
Reminders and Tasks related to plant care (e.g. watering, misting, fertilising, repotting)
Plant Recognition based on photos provided by the User
integration with measurement devices and storage and presentation of Sensor Data
generation and scanning of QR codes linking to User resources (e.g. Plant Instances)
section3.p1: The Service is currently provided as a free beta version. The Provider may introduce paid plans, limitations for the free version, advertisements, or subscriptions in the future, of which Users will be informed in advance.
section3.p2: The Provider may modify, expand, limit, or discontinue selected functionalities of the Service, provided that such changes do not violate mandatory provisions of law.
